description:
The SUCF Projects dataset contains relevant data for all design contracts for projects managed by the State University Construction Fund that are advertised for procurement. This dataset identifies all firms that responded to requests for qualifications that went on to be interviewed for design work on 
a project.

name: State University Construction Fund (SUCF) Short-Listed Firms: Beginning 2000
